commit.message:
ObjectInputStream.java (callReadMethod): re-throw `ClassNotFoundException'.

2004-09-24  Casey Marshall <csm@gnu.org>

	* java/io/ObjectInputStream.java (callReadMethod): re-throw
	`ClassNotFoundException'.

From-SVN: r88023
